subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In a sign-and-trade deal for Keyon Dooling, the Nets gave the Magic cash and the trade exception they received in the deal that sent Jason Kidd to the Dallas Mavericks.
snippet: In a sign-and-trade deal for Keyon Dooling, the Nets gave the Magic cash and the trade exception they received in the deal that sent Jason Kidd to the Dallas Mavericks.
